path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/1BOX Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has privileges to add/remove minters and mint tokens up to max supply amount to any address.

findings.title: Minters can mint tokens up to max supply amount to any address
findings.description: Minters have the capability to mint tokens up to the maximum supply amount and transfer them to any desired address.

findings.title: No access control on delegateBySig function
findings.description: The delegateBySig function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to perform actions.
